trans-unit.source: Represents a step in a wizard control that can be customized through the use of templates.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个可以通过使用模板自定义的向导控件中的步骤。

trans-unit.source: The TemplatedWizardStep class is provided to enable developers to apply a template to the steps in a control that acts as a wizard.
trans-unit.target: TemplatedWizardStep 类提供用于让开发人员将模板应用于控件中用作向导的步骤。

trans-unit.source: The TemplatedWizardStep class is intended to be used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: TemplatedWizardStep 类旨在主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: You can apply a theme to TemplatedWizardStep.
trans-unit.target: 可以将主题应用到 TemplatedWizardStep。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying the content of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示中的步骤的内容的模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for displaying the content of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>对象，其中包含用于显示中步骤的内容的模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control uses to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*> template for a step.
trans-unit.target: 获取容器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*>步骤模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Although the syntax includes setting the ContentTemplateContainer property, it is for internal use only, so the property is effectively read-only.
trans-unit.target: 尽管语法包括设置 ContentTemplateContainer 属性，它是内部仅供使用，因此该属性是有效地只读的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*> template for a step.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*>步骤模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.ContentTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template for displaying the navigation user interface (UI) of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示导航用户界面 (UI) 中的步骤的模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object that contains the template for displaying the navigation UI of a step in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref>对象，其中包含用于显示一个步骤的导航用户界面的模板中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control uses to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*> template for a step.
trans-unit.target: 获取容器<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件用于创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*>步骤模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Although the syntax includes setting the CustomNavigationTemplateContainer property, it is for internal use only, so the property is effectively read-only.
trans-unit.target: 尽管语法包括设置 CustomNavigationTemplateContainer 属性，它是内部仅供使用，因此该属性是有效地只读的。

trans-unit.source: Your code should verify that the CustomNavigationTemplateContainer property is not `null` before referencing it.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码应验证 CustomNavigationTemplateContainer 属性不是`null`之前引用它。

trans-unit.source: This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在可视化设计器，可绑定并非是可在运行时绑定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*> template for a step.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*>步骤模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*> has no content.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*>没有任何内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep.CustomNavigationTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要应用于控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: The name of the skin to apply to the control.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于控件的外观的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>
